item.title: Introducing Transitive Dependencies in Visual Studio
item.description: We heard from you that direct dependencies are easy to track, but that you struggle with tracking transitive dependencies. To help you track transitive dependencies and remediate vulnerabilities quickly with SDK-style projects,
item.author: (Jon Douglas)
